archimate:Resource.name: Personalization Manager [ns:togsoara]
archimate:Resource.documentation:
This ABB allows users to customize the appearance of the user interface according to personal preferences. The customization is accomplished partly through administrative set-up, which defines the default settings and access rights to user interfaces/web pages. It supports both:
* Rule-based personalization to select content for the user such as a rule might display special discounts to gold customers, but only during the summer months * Collaborative filtering technology-based personalization to select content based on common interests or behaviors
